settings.title: Drop part of sentence into the correct box.
settings.directions: Drop part of sentence into the correct Ablative Absolute or Main Sentence box.

item.itemText: With the expansion plan having been established,
With the Roman Republic having been completed,
With Claudius having been possibly poisoned by his wife,
With the soothsayer portending an omen to Caesar,
Roman Emperors supplied statues, monuments, and infrastructure throughout the Empire.
the Roman Empire became the new form of government.
Nero was able to ascend into power.
the Ides of March was foretold to be an ominous day.
